channel.title: ENDING ? WTF ?
channel.description:
what the hell happened at the black mesa ending ? this was not the half life 1 ending !
i just jumped into the portal in the lab and the game was over !! but this was not the ending on half life 1 ! WTF ?

item.title: ENDING ? WTF ?
item.dc:creator: Conti
item.description:
All your questions will be answered here:

https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/General_FAQ#The_Single-Player_Release

item.title: ENDING ? WTF ?
item.dc:creator: omidelf
item.description:
xilef:

It’s Black Mesa: episode 1, the Xen part will be completed at a later date along with deathmatch, it’s been clearly stated everywhere by everyone, even the top gaming websites.

its wired that they are creating an episode only for xen part ! because it was only a chapter in half life 1 , how come they are creating an episode only for that part ?

when will this “xen episode” come out anyway ?

Read full topic

I can’t wait for finish the game too.
